sections.title: Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: Requires ability to cast 1st-level divine spells and Dragon mystery for oracles, advances divine spellcasting progression at indicated levels without granting other class benefits.

sections.title: Spirit of the Dragon (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: Dragon apostle levels stack with oracle levels for oracle revelations, domain powers, and curse effects, and grants Dragon mystery revelations at 2nd, 5th, and 8th level.

sections.title: Dragon Bite (Su) (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: At 2nd level, can use dragon bite ability when using talons of the dragon revelation, or for rounds per day equal to 3 + Charisma modifier if lacking the revelation.

sections.title: Breath Weapon (Su) (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: At 3rd level, gains breath weapon revelation from Dragon mystery or an additional daily use if already possessed, with type and shape based on selected dragon type.

sections.title: Blindsense (Ex) (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: At 5th level, adds 30 feet to blindsense range if already possessed through dragon senses revelation.

sections.title: Dragon Form (Su) (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: At 7th level, gains form of the dragon revelation or an additional daily use if already possessed.

sections.title: Wings (Su) (Dragon Apostle (Dragon Disciple Archetype))
sections.description: At 9th level, gains wings of the dragon revelation or increases flight speed to 90 feet if already possessed.
